properties.name: fitParent
properties.description: Fully occupies parent element client area.

properties.name: mask
properties.description: Show masker.

properties.name: maskMessage
properties.description: Masker label.

properties.name: dynamicTab
properties.description: Applies left-indent on tab item bar.

properties.name: noWrap
properties.description: Does not wrap child element overflows in main axis direction.

properties.name: overflowXVisible
properties.description: Shows overflowed child element portion in horizontal direction.

properties.name: overflowXHidden
properties.description: Hides overflowed child element portion in horizontal direction.

properties.name: overflowXScroll
properties.description: Always shows horizontal scroller.

properties.name: overflowXAuto
properties.description: Only shows horizontal scroller when child element overflows.

properties.name: overflowYVisible
properties.description: Shows overflowed child element portion in vertical direction.

properties.name: overflowYHidden
properties.description: Hides overflowed child element portion in vertical direction.

properties.name: overflowYScroll
properties.description: Always shows vertical scroller.

properties.name: overflowYAuto
properties.description: Only shows vertical scroller when child element overflows.

properties.name: alignStart
properties.description:
Child elements are packed toward the start of main axis line.

`oooo oooo ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- ----`

properties.name: alignEnd
properties.description:
Child elements are packed toward the end of main axis line.

`---- ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- oooo oooo oooo`

properties.name: alignCenter
properties.description:
Child elements are centered along the main axis line.

`---- ---- ---- oooo oooo oooo ---- ---- ----`

properties.name: alignSpaceBetween
properties.description:
Child elements are evenly distributed in the main axis line. First item is on the start line, last item on the end line.

`oooo ---- ---- ---- oooo ---- ---- ---- oooo`

properties.name: alignSpaceAround
properties.description:
Child elements are evenly distributed in the main axis line with equal space around them.

`---- oooo ---- oooo ---- oooo ----`

properties.name: crossAlignStart
properties.description: Child elements are packed toward the start of cross axis line.

properties.name: crossAlignEnd
properties.description: Child element are packed toward the end of cross axis line.

properties.name: crossAlignCenter
properties.description: Child element are centered along the cross axis line.

properties.name: crossAlignStretch
properties.description: Stretches child element to fill the container in the cross axis direction.

properties.name: crossAlignBaseline
properties.description: Child items are aligned such as their baselines align in the cross axis direction.

properties.name: fitParent
properties.description: Fully occupies parent element client area.

properties.name: mask
properties.description: Show masker.

properties.name: maskMessage
properties.description: Masker label.

properties.name: dynamicTab
properties.description: Applies left-indent on tab item bar.
